title: No more S rank alerts in post game chat?
body:
I hope this is not intentional 
I  liked the orange s rank notifications

not just for my own ego but it's nice to know if your teammates got S

anyone know if this is intentional or just preseason jitter bugs?

replies.body: Is this in the Flex-queue game post-lobby? If so, I've actually seen another case of this happening. I'm not sure if it's intentional, however, since the Flex-queue is so new, it may be a visual bug. I'll have more information on this soon.

I have indeed notice this is only a thing in flex queue pos lobby 
thanks for the reply

When a silver player talks about "ego"  kappa pride
But nice question. :3
